GPT_response.title: Elon Musk's Social Media Company May Lose Advertising Revenue
GPT_response.background: Elon Musk's social media company, referred to as 'X', is facing potential financial losses of up to $75 million by the end of the year. This comes as several major brands have decided to pause their marketing campaigns on the platform.
GPT_response.summary: According to reports, Elon Musk's social media company could lose significant advertising revenue due to the pause in marketing campaigns by major brands. This could result in potential losses of up to $75 million by year-end.
